issue.title: [CF 363] Letting an Icon check whether itself is show
issue.body:
Attempting it seems silly, but I felt like experimenting and created an icon condition in which Tmw checks whether the icon itself is show. This almost froze my computer and spat out some pretty ugly error message I do not want to reproduce.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #363 | Raw

comments.body:
I used to have code that prevented an icon from appearing in the dropdown for icon shown conditions for that icon, but it looks like it got lost when I rewrote some things a while back.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
